description: A nice riverside walk along the Medway from Maidstone to Leybourne Lakes Country Park . It's a lovely section of the river, passing a number of interesting villages. The route follows a section of the Medway Valley Walk long distance trail. The walk starts on St Peter's Bridge and heads north to Ringlestone, passing the Gallagher Stadium, home to Maidstone United F.C. The river bends round to the village of Aylesford . Here you cross the river and follow it round to New Hythe and Leybourne Lakes in Snodland .  In the park you will find 230 acres of lakes and woodland providing a peaceful location for wildlife and birdwatching. After exploring the park you can catch the train back to Maidstone from New Hythe.
